body:
could've archived the posts that were irrelevant / off topic  just like y'all archived my irrelevant posts on other threads but y'all had to lock it

i just want to know why slack admin moderator referee diamond translator resepignev archived my threads and deactivated my account directly from him and himself only seeing he isn't accepting my contact request > :(

title: why have my threads and posts been archived 2

replies.body:
I decided to lock the thread because the majority of comments were off topic arguing and there was no sign of it getting back on track..I said this before I locked it.

A forum post isn't needed for this.
I suggest you wait until Res accepts your contact request so you can talk about this in private.

Locking..
